org.springframework.security.saml.storage
Interface SAMLMessageStorageFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmptyStorageFactory, HttpSessionStorageFactory
public interface SAMLMessageStorageFactory

Factories implementing this interface provide services for storage and retrieval of SAML messages for e.g. verification of retrieved responses.

Method Summary
 SAMLMessageStorage getMessageStorage(HttpServletRequest request)
          Provides message storage related to the given request.
 

Method Detail

getMessageStorage

Provides message storage related to the given request.

Parameters:
request - currently processed HTTP request
Returns:
storage objects
